text: 4|47|He kitabapraaptasakala! Ami mukhamandalasamuhaka bikrta karai pascadaphale ghuraa'i diyara agate athaba acahabuca chabataka yidarae abhisampata karaichilo se'idarae abhisampata karaara agate tomalokara ocarata yi ache tara samarthakaraupe ami yi aratirna karaicho tara prati tomaloke imana ana; (jani thoraa) arau allahara adesa karyakarai haiye thake.
